item.title: Testing Kubernetes with KUTTL
item.description: Automated testing is the only way to be sure that your code works. Enabling automated testing can be hard and we say a lot of tools to write automated tests in the industry since the beginning. Some veterans in the industry may remember Selenium, Cucumber frameworks that help automate testing in the browser. However, testing in Kubernetes can be hard. In Percona we deal with Kubernetes and have different operators to automate the management of databases.
